ai.summary: A ultra-short, easy segment of the Green Chain Walk in the UK, totaling 0.1 km. Suitable for a quick urban stroll to experience a portion of this longer coastal path.
ai.terrain_summary: Urban trail with a flat profile. Surfaces are likely paved or compacted paths in parks or along streets; expect light-walking on city terrain.
ai.safety_notes: Be mindful of pedestrian traffic and road crossings in urban areas. Check weather and lighting for evening or dawn walks. Keep valuables secure and stay on designated paths.
ai.best_seasons: All year, with especially pleasant conditions in spring and autumn
